title: all text in nyc
description: "all text in nyc" is a search engine that finds text in New York City's Google Street View images. Search for any word or phrase to see where it appears across the cityâ€”in shop signs, graffiti, advertisements, and protest signs.

title: All the Buildings in Manhattan
description: An interactive 3D visualization of the all the buildings in Manhattan.

title: citymeetings.nyc
description: citymeetings.nyc turns NYC Council meetings into short, quick-to-skim, easy-to-share segments same-day using AI and human oversight.

title: Curio
description: Curio is a framework for collaborative urban visual analytics that uses a dataflow model with multiple abstraction levels (code, grammar, GUI elements) to facilitate collaboration across the design and implementation of visual analytics components. The framework allows experts to intertwine preprocessing, managing, and visualization stages while tracking provenance of code and visualizations.

title: FloodNet NYC - Sensor
description: This repository houses information regarding the build, deployment, and maintenance of the FloodnNet project's flood sensor.

title: My 3D Trains
description: My 3D Trains is an interactive NYC Subway Map and trip planner. Pick your start station and end station, and view your route on the map, along with trip information.

title: NYCDB
description: NYCDB is a database comprised of publicly available datasets, mostly from government agencies, that are relevant to housing in New York City. NYCDB collects these separate datasets in one place while cleaning and indexing them for ease of use.

title: NYC Train Times
description: Display upcoming train times for each station (with filtering by station name or route).
